name: Assassin
desc: Takes down single enemies with targeted attacks.

name: Sweeper
desc: Deals with groups of foes through multi-target attacks.

name: Medic
desc: Specializes in healing skills that restore the party's HP.

name: Guardian
desc: Protects allies and increases the party's defense.

name: Strategist
desc: Buffs allies' stats to improve their combat abilities.

name: Saboteur
desc: Debuffs foes' stats to give the party the upper hand.

name: Elucidator
desc: Helps allies from off-field with buffs and support skills.
